name: Academia RFID
tag_list: rfid-center, rfid-centre-of-excellence, rfid-lab, canada, quebec, montreal, rfid-training, rfid-certifications, rfid-expert-service, certified-professionals
overview:
Academia RFID is an RFID Centre of Excellence working hand in hand with an international network of universities, industry-recognized associations and technology partners offering trilingual RFID training/certification, research & development and expert RFID services to public and private organizations interested in discovering and implementing RFID technology and practices.

Academia RFID works with organizations worldwide to educate their personnel on the benefits, restrictions and various facets of RFID technology, and helps them design comprehensive roadmaps for implementation, integration and sustainability for their RFID initiatives.

Academia RFID is a Centre that offers more than just knowledge transfer and demonstrations; it is a fully functional research environment that has project teams entirely dedicated to business process reengineering and software development teams focused on solution design and integration.
